// src/components/Board.jsx import React from "react"; import BikeIcon from "./BikeIcon"; // Colores inspirados en el tablero físico const RING_COLORS = { expectativas: "#FCD135", // amarillo contribucion: "#3E73C9", // azul desafios: "#E84137" // rojo }; // Posiciones aproximadas para 6 jugadores en cada anillo const TOKEN_POSITIONS = { 0: [ // Expectativas – exterior { top: "8%", left: "50%" }, { top: "22%", left: "86%" }, { top: "50%", left: "94%" }, { top: "78%", left: "86%" }, { top: "92%", left: "50%" }, { top: "78%", left: "14%" } ], 1: [ // Contribución – anillo medio { top: "22%", left: "50%" }, { top: "32%", left: "76%" }, { top: "50%", left: "82%" }, { top: "68%", left: "76%" }, { top: "78%", left: "50%" }, { top: "68%", left: "24%" } ], 2: [ // Desafíos – interior { top: "34%", left: "50%" }, { top: "42%", left: "62%" }, { top: "50%", left: "68%" }, { top: "58%", left: "62%" }, { top: "66%", left: "50%" }, { top: "50%", left: "38%" } ] }; function Board({ players, currentRound, currentPlayerId }) { return (
{/* TABLERO SVG – diseño estilo PDF pero optimizado */} {/* BICICLETAS / FICHAS */} {players.map((p, index) => { const roundToShow = p.maxRoundReached >= 0 ? p.maxRoundReached : null; if (roundToShow === null) return null; const pos = TOKEN_POSITIONS[roundToShow]?.[index] || TOKEN_POSITIONS[0][index]; const isActive = p.id === currentPlayerId && roundToShow === currentRound; return (
); })}
); } export default Board;
